message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. I know it's a high price, but it's truly worth a lot to me.  I believe this product can be incredibly valuable to your business, and I'm open to discussing a fair price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I need to stay within my budget. I am willing to pay $950,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $950,000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000. This price reflects the true value of the product and allows for a fair profit for both of us.  I'm confident that this product will be a valuable asset to your business, and I'm eager to close this deal.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of your product and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $1,050,000 for the product.
